action.text: SA 2228 fell when the motion by Senator McConnell to concur in the House amendment to S. 140 with an amendment (SA 2227) tabled.
Considered by Senate (Message from the House considered).
Amendment SA 2228 proposed by Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 2227. (consideration: CR S2112; text: CR S2112) Of a perfecting nature.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2228 proposed by Senator McConnell to Amendment SA 2227.
